title: Task 91

question.text: What does Maria prepares the agenda in advance mean?

answers.answer: Maria makes the agenda during the meeting.
answers.feedback: In advance means to do something ahead of time, not during.

answers.answer: Maria thinks about the agenda but doesn't write it down.
answers.feedback: Prepares means to actually create or put together, not just think about.

answers.answer: Maria gets the agenda ready before the meeting happens.

answers.feedback: Preparing in advance is the opposite of forgetting; it shows Maria is responsible.

dialogue.text: Maria prepares the agenda in advance.

description: To prepare in advance means to get something ready before the time it is needed. This helps meetings to go smoothly because everyone knows what will be discussed.
